findings.title: Clashing Position Hash
findings.description: `position_hash()` can be called for two or more separate positions with the same arguments, allowing for the same `_nonce` value to pass and resulting in the `position_hash` being the same for both positions.

findings.title: Incorrect Logic When Cancelling Kernel
findings.description: L459 checks if `collateralAmount - filledOrCancelledLoanAmount >= cancelledLoanTokenAmount`. This should instead be `loanAmountOffered - filledOrCancelledLoanAmount >= cancelledLoanTokenAmount`.
